meta-data-group.description: The Dublin Core Metadata Element Set

meta-data.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the content of the resource
meta-data.name: contributor

meta-data.description: The extent or scope of the content of the resource
meta-data.name: coverage

meta-data.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the content of the resource
meta-data.name: creator

meta-data.description: A date associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource
meta-data.name: date

meta-data.description: A date associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource
meta-data.name: description

meta-data.description: The physical or digital manifestation of the resource
meta-data.name: format

meta-data.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context
meta-data.name: identifier

meta-data.description: A language of the intellectual content of the resource
meta-data.name: language

meta-data.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available
meta-data.name: publisher

meta-data.description: A reference to a related resource
meta-data.name: relation

meta-data.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource
meta-data.name: rightsManagement

meta-data.description: A reference to a resource from which the present resource is derived
meta-data.name: source

meta-data.description: The topic of the content of the resource
meta-data.name: subject

meta-data.description: A name given to the resource
meta-data.name: title

meta-data.description: The nature or genre of the content of the resource
meta-data.name: resourceType

meta-data-group.description: Dublin Core Other Elements and Element Refinements

meta-data.description: A summary of the content of the resource
meta-data.name: abstract

meta-data.description: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status
meta-data.name: accessRights

meta-data.description: Any form of the title used as a substitute or alternative to the formal title of the resource
meta-data.name: alternative

meta-data.description: A class of entity for whom the resource is intended or useful
meta-data.name: audience

meta-data.description: Date (often a range) that the resource will become or did become available
meta-data.name: available

meta-data.description: A bibliographic reference for the resource
meta-data.name: bibliographicCitation

meta-data.description: A reference to an established standard to which the resource conforms
meta-data.name: conformsTo

meta-data.description: Date of creation of the resource
meta-data.name: created

meta-data.description: Date of acceptance of the resource (e.g. of thesis by university department, of article by journal, etc.)
meta-data.name: dateAccepted

meta-data.description: Date of a statement of copyright
meta-data.name: dateCopyrighted

meta-data.description: Date of submission of the resource (e.g. thesis, articles, etc.)
meta-data.name: dateSubmitted

meta-data.description: A general statement describing the education or training context. Alternatively, a more specific statement of the location of the audience in terms of its progression through an education or training context
meta-data.name: audienceEducationLevel

meta-data.description: The size or duration of the resource
meta-data.name: extent

meta-data.description: The described resource pre-existed the referenced resource, which is essentially the same intellectual content presented in another format
meta-data.name: hasFormat

meta-data.description: The described resource includes the referenced resource either physically or logically
meta-data.name: hasPart

meta-data.description: The described resource has a version, edition, or adaptation, namely, the referenced resource
meta-data.name: hasVersion

meta-data.description: The described resource is the same intellectual content of the referenced resource, but presented in another format
meta-data.name: isFormatOf

meta-data.description: The described resource is a physical or logical part of the referenced resource
meta-data.name: isPartOf

meta-data.description: The described resource is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the referenced resource
meta-data.name: isReferencedBy

meta-data.description: The described resource is supplanted, displaced, or superseded by the referenced resource
meta-data.name: isReplacedBy

meta-data.description: The described resource is required by the referenced resource, either physically or logically
meta-data.name: isReplacedBy

meta-data.description: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource
meta-data.name: issued

meta-data.description: The described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation of the referenced resource. Changes in version imply substantive changes in content rather than differences in format
meta-data.name: isVersionOf

meta-data.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource
meta-data.name: license

meta-data.description: A class of entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful
meta-data.name: mediator

meta-data.description: The material or physical carrier of the resource
meta-data.name: medium

meta-data.description: Date on which the resource was changed
meta-data.name: modified

meta-data.description: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity and interpretation
meta-data.name: provenance

meta-data.description: The described resource references, cites, or otherwise points to the referenced resource
meta-data.name: references

meta-data.description: The described resource supplants, displaces, or supersedes the referenced resource
meta-data.name: replaces

meta-data.description: The described resource requires the referenced resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence of content
meta-data.name: requires

meta-data.description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource
meta-data.name: rightsHolder

meta-data.description: Spatial characteristics of the intellectual content of the resource
meta-data.name: spatial

meta-data.description: A list of subunits of the content of the resource
meta-data.name: tableOfContents

meta-data.description: Temporal characteristics of the intellectual content of the resource
meta-data.name: temporal

meta-data.description: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource
meta-data.name: valid
